answer: LEAP offers companies a means of monitoring their objects using location and condition-based information.
question: What does LEAP offer companies?
reference_llm_eval: LEAP offers companies a means of monitoring their objects using location and condition-based information.
result: LEAP offers companies the ability to locate all moving objects whose location and/or condition play(s) a crucial role in their business processes. It is also perfect for companies that want to develop business models themselves in the areas of IoT, tracking, track and pay, tracking as a service, or geofencing.
